title: Ticket #6154: Remove ClassAd log transaction backup file feature
description:
Remove the Job Queue Backup feature added in HTCondor 7.1.4. This feature allowed transactions in the job queue log to be mirrored on a separate volume in case writing to the log file failed.

This feature is undocumented beyond release notes for 7.1.4 and we are unaware of anyone using it.
remarks:
2017-Feb-22 15:14:56 by tannenba:
The commit in this ticket also improves the error message in the log, as requested by OSG in #6131.

2017-Apr-20 10:44:21 by tim:
No docs needed.
check_ins: 2017-Feb-16 15:51   Check-in [50174]: Remove ClassAd log transaction backup file feature #6154 This feature is undocumented and unused to the best of our knowledge. (By Jaime Frey )
